name: Mjolnir (Thor's Hammer)
description: Wield the power of the Thunder God with this faithful replica of Thor's mighty hammer. Made from enchanted Uru metal, it's nearly impossible to lift unless you're worthy.

name: Tesseract (Space Stone)
description: Harness the power of the cosmos with the Space Stone, encased within the Tesseract. Instantly transport yourself to any location in the universe.

name: Eye of Agamotto
description: The mystical amulet worn by Doctor Strange, capable of manipulating time itself. Comes with a cautionary warning about potential time loops.

name: Infinity Gauntlet
description: The ultimate weapon, designed to hold all six Infinity Stones. Wear this gauntlet and control the very fabric of reality. Stones not included.

name: Arc Reactor
description: A fully functional Arc Reactor, just like the one that powers Tony Stark's Iron Man suits. Compact, clean energy for all your needs.

name: Captain America's Shield
description: The iconic vibranium shield, a symbol of freedom and justice. Nearly indestructible, perfect for both defense and offense.

name: Loki's Scepter
description: A powerful weapon wielded by Loki, containing the Mind Stone. Use it to influence the minds of others and bend them to your will.

name: Black Panther's Suit
description: A full-body suit made from vibranium, providing enhanced strength, agility, and protection. Perfect for blending into the night.

name: Nano Gauntlet
description: Tony Stark's version of the Infinity Gauntlet, designed to harness the power of the Infinity Stones. Sleek, modern, and lethal.

name: Ant-Man's Suit
description: Shrink down to the size of an ant or grow to gigantic proportions with this advanced Pym-tech suit. Comes with a built-in communication system.

name: Stormbreaker (Thor's Axe)
description: The legendary weapon forged in the heart of a dying star. Capable of summoning the Bifrost and slaying even the mightiest foes.

name: Spider-Man's Web-Shooters
description: Custom-built web-shooters by Peter Parker, perfect for swinging between skyscrapers or capturing criminals. Web fluid sold separately.

name: Iron Man Mark L Suit
description: The cutting-edge Iron Man suit, made from nanotechnology. Instant deployment and self-repair capabilities make this the ultimate armor.

name: Wakandan Kimoyo Beads
description: High-tech beads from Wakanda, used for communication, health monitoring, and more. A versatile tool for any situation.

name: Star-Lord's Element Guns
description: Dual-wielded blasters capable of firing all four classical elements: fire, water, air, and earth. Just don't lose them like Peter Quill.

name: Yondu's Yaka Arrow
description: A single arrow controlled by whistling, with deadly precision. Made from Yaka metal, this weapon is both unique and lethal.

name: Doctor Strange's Cloak of Levitation
description: A sentient cloak that grants the wearer the ability to fly. It also has a mind of its own, so be prepared for some sass.

name: Winter Soldier's Vibranium Arm
description: A powerful prosthetic arm made of vibranium, designed for enhanced strength and durability. Comes with built-in weaponry.

name: Scarlet Witch's Tiara
description: A mystical tiara that amplifies the wearer's magical abilities. Perfect for chaos magic practitioners.

name: Hawkeye's Trick Arrows
description: A set of high-tech arrows with various functions, from explosive tips to grappling hooks. Perfect for any sharpshooter.

name: Gamora's Godslayer Sword
description: A weapon of unparalleled sharpness, capable of cutting through almost anything. Wielded by the deadliest woman in the galaxy.

name: Nebula's Cybernetic Upgrades
description: A set of cybernetic enhancements that improve strength, reflexes, and durability. Optional upgrades include built-in weaponry.

name: Black Widow's Widow's Bite
description: A pair of wrist-mounted electric shock devices used by Natasha Romanoff. Perfect for taking down opponents silently.

name: Vision's Mind Stone
description: The powerful Mind Stone, embedded in Vision's forehead. Control minds, create illusions, or unleash devastating energy blasts.

name: Hulk's Gamma Radiation
description: A vial of concentrated gamma radiation, the source of the Hulk's immense strength. Handle with extreme caution.

name: Captain Marvel's Photon Blasters
description: Powerful energy weapons capable of firing photonic blasts. Inspired by the weaponry of the Kree Starforce.

name: Thanos' Double-Edged Sword
description: A massive, double-edged sword used by Thanos. Capable of cutting through nearly anything, it symbolizes his relentless pursuit of power.

name: Shuri's Vibranium Gauntlets
description: High-tech gauntlets designed by Shuri, capable of firing powerful energy blasts. Perfect for any tech-savvy warrior.

name: Valkyrie's Dragonfang Sword
description: The legendary sword once wielded by the Valkyrie, capable of cutting through the strongest of foes. A weapon of true Asgardian craftsmanship.

name: Red Skull's Tesseract Holder
description: A special containment unit designed to hold the Tesseract. Keeps the Space Stone secure and stable, even under extreme conditions.

name: Drax's Dual Daggers
description: A pair of matching daggers wielded by the fearsome Drax the Destroyer. Razor-sharp and perfectly balanced for combat.

name: Rocket's Custom Blaster
description: A high-powered blaster designed and modified by Rocket Raccoon. Features adjustable settings for maximum destruction.

name: Groot's Regrowth Serum
description: A vial of serum capable of accelerating plant growth, specifically designed for Flora colossi like Groot. Perfect for regrowing limbs or other wooden appendages.

name: The Aether (Reality Stone)
description: The powerful Aether, containing the Reality Stone. Bend reality to your will, turning your wildest dreams into realityâ€”or your worst nightmares.

name: The Collector's Cosmic Vault
description: A secure storage vault capable of holding the universe's rarest treasures. Designed by the Collector himself, this vault is impenetrable.

name: Quake's Gauntlets
description: Specially designed gauntlets that allow the wearer to control seismic energy. Inspired by the Inhuman Quake, also known as Daisy Johnson.

name: The Darkhold
description: An ancient book of dark magic, containing spells and secrets too powerful for most to handle. Use at your own risk.

name: Red Wing Drone
description: A drone used by Falcon for reconnaissance and combat support. Fully autonomous and capable of high-speed flight.

name: E.D.I.T.H. Glasses
description: Tony Stark's final gift to Peter Parker, these AI-powered glasses provide access to a global defense network. Only for responsible users.

name: Shuri's Vibranium Sneakers
description: Silent, high-tech sneakers designed by Shuri. Made from vibranium, these shoes absorb sound and provide unmatched comfort.

name: The Ten Rings
description: A set of ten mystical rings wielded by Wenwu, each possessing unique powers. Wield them all for ultimate control over your enemies.

name: Korg's Mace
description: A massive stone mace wielded by Korg, made from the finest rock in the universe. Perfect for smashing opponents in gladiatorial combat.

name: The Milano Spaceship
description: Peter Quill's beloved spaceship, the Milano. A fast and agile vessel, perfect for intergalactic travel and evading the law.

name: Ultron's Vibranium Shell
description: The indestructible vibranium body used by Ultron. Stronger than steel, more durable than any other material.

name: Pym Particles
description: A vial of Pym Particles, capable of shrinking or enlarging objects to incredible sizes. Handle with care, and remember: size matters.

name: The Necrosword
description: A powerful and ancient weapon capable of killing gods. Once wielded by Gorr the God Butcher, this sword is the embodiment of darkness.

name: The Quantum Tunnel
description: A portable Quantum Tunnel, designed for safe travel to and from the Quantum Realm. Perfect for time heists or alternate dimension exploration.

name: The Grandmaster's Melt Stick
description: The ultimate tool of punishment from the Grandmaster. Use it to melt down any disobedient underlings. No batteries required.

name: Hela's Helm
description: The powerful and intimidating helm worn by Hela, Goddess of Death. Provides immense strength and conjures weapons from thin air.

name: Doomsday Protocol
description: A classified SHIELD protocol for dealing with catastrophic threats. Contains instructions and plans for surviving the unthinkable.
